title: Game Scoop! 690: Cyberpunk's Phantom Premise
description:
Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, John Davison,  and Stella Chung -- are discussing Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty, the September 2006 issue of Nintendo Power, ragdoll physics, House of the Dragon, and more. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.

 

Follow Daemon on Twitter @DaemZero

Timestamps:
00:00:00 - INTRO/CYBERPUNK 2077: PHANTOM LIBERTY

00:14:56 - THE SEPTEMBER 2006 ISSUE OF NINTENDO POWER

00:42:14 - WHATEVER HAPPENED TO RAGDOLL PHYSICS?

00:46:25 - HOUSE OF THE DRAGON & THE RINGS OF POWER

00:55:27 - VIDEO GAME 20 QUESTIONS
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, John Davison, Stella Chung)
